titleStmt.title: Vincent van Gogh, The Letters. Secundary Bibliography

sourceDesc.p: VG bibliography.xml and access database 'Personen in de correspondentie.mdb', table 'Literary works'

body.head: Bibliography
body.p: This bibliography extends to September 2007, with the exception of a few important Van Gogh publications which appeared after that date. The issue numbers are given when a volume of a periodical consists of two or more issues not numbered on consecutively, as is the case with L’Illustration, The Graphic and the Illustrirte Zeitung. In all other cases the number before the date is that of the volume.
The prefixes of personal names (de, van, van de, ter, etc.) are ignored in the alphabetization. Thus Jean de la Fontaine will be found under F.
